entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
